## Overview {.column-width="full"}

This dashboard provides an interactive look at key WDI indicators (hover, zoom, pan).

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

df = pd.read_csv("wdi.csv")
```


## Key Charts {.columns}

### GDP vs Life Expectancy {.column}

```{python}
fig1 = px.scatter(
    df,
    x="life_expectancy",
    y="gdp_per_capita",
    hover_name="country",
    title="GDP per Capita vs Life Expectancy",
    labels={"gdp_per_capita":"GDP per Capita","life_expectancy":"Life Expectancy"}
)
fig1
```


### Inflation Distribution {.column}

```{python}
fig2 = px.histogram(
    df,
    x="inflation_rate",
    nbins=30,
    title="Inflation Rate Distribution",
    labels={"inflation_rate":"Inflation Rate"}
)
fig2
```
